channel.title: Binding this fight "profile" to an npc id?
channel.description:
Well, the title may have sounded confusing, but.. I'll explain it here
Base: Flaresoft 474 (Which is Hyperion/rs2serv)
Well, basically, if you don't know how it functions, flaresoft uses individual class files for each "boss" monster if you will, in this case I mean a npc that uses more than one type of attack, for example, Solus (One of the bosses) summons mages, heals, rapid attacks, barrages and moves back a step, etc.
So I decided to make one myself, and it includes delrith, and he will play in one of the main storylines in my server.. so.. once I finished it up (I based it heavily off of current boss classes, making modifications to wherever it suited my needs), I realized something... what exactly binds/tells the server that Delrith should use that class file for his attacks? So I decided to look through the other class files.. I couldn't find anything like that, so I decided to do a quick skim through the source, still nothing to be found.
Basically, if anyone has any experience with this, could they help me figure out how to "bind" the class and the id?
